194  IMPLICIT NONE
195 !
196 ! Description: Perform a 1-timestep integration of the Atmosphere Model,
197 ! including assimilation, physics and dynamics processing.
198 !
199 ! Method: Sequential execution of code sections below, with control and
200 ! logical switches determining whether each section is accessed.
201 !
202 !ND ND code section and UM added, tidy and re-number required.
203 ! Section 0. Initialisation.
204 ! Section 0.1 Filter near polar winds and theta
205 ! Section 1.0 Call Atmospheric Physics1
206 ! STASH diagnostics for Physics1.
207 ! Section 2. Calculate new time-level estimates to Theta, q, qcl, qcf
208 ! Section 2.1 Calculate advective Momentum increments.
209 ! Section 2.2 Calculate Semi-Lagrangian part of continuity equation.
210 ! Section 2.3 Diagnostics at end of advection.
211 ! STASH diagnostics for Dynamics advection.
212 ! Section 3.0 Call Atmospheric Physics2
213 ! STASH diagnostics for Physics2.
214 ! Section 4. Form and solve Helmholtz equation and update variables.
215 ! Section 4.1 Form and solve Helmholtz equation, return all corrections
216 ! Set lateral boundaries.
217 ! Section 5.0 Calculate rho at new time level, using flux form.
218 ! Section 6.0 Calculate u, v, w, theta, q, qcl, qcf at new time level.
219 ! Section 7.0 Mean all polar variables on a level to remove deviation.
220 ! Section 8.0 Update pressure to value at new-time level.
221 ! VAR or AC assimilation.
222 ! Section 9.0 Diagnostics at end of timestep
223 ! STASH diagnostics - dynamics based (section 15).
224 ! STASH diagnostics - physics based (section 16).
225 ! STASH diagnostics - climate end of timestep (section 30).
226 !
227 ! Language: FORTRAN 77 + common extensions.
228 ! This code is written to UMDP3 v6 programming standards.
229 !
230 ! System component: Control Atmos
231 !
232 ! Declarations:
233 !
234 ! Global variables (*CALLed COMDECKs etc...):
